structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 10, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 53, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 58. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 33. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Order to correct violation -- Injunctive remedies.
